sentences.en: Do this successfully time after time, and your main role as copywriter has been done.
sentences.cn: 日复一日都能做到如此, 您主要角色——文案,便成功了.

sentences.en: I am writing to inquire about possible openings in your agency for a copywriter.
sentences.cn: 本人欲探询贵公司是否有撰稿员职位空缺.

sentences.en: I started out as an advertising copywriter and , you know, moved up the agency ladders.
sentences.cn: 我一开始是从事广告文案撰写, 然后一路在公司里往上爬.

sentences.en: Moreover also has the company market department correlation copywriter and the information reports composes the work.
sentences.cn: 另外还有公司市场部相关文案和资讯报道的撰写工作.

sentences.en: Shares responsibility for the execution of all printed materials with copywriter.
sentences.cn: 与文案共同负责执行印刷工作.

sentences.en: The junior analyst in IT could be your most creative copywriter, but when relegated to coding all day, she may never have a chance to collaborate in a way that can deliver the most to a project.
sentences.cn: 你公司的基层IT分析师可能是最有创造力的文案撰稿人，但是，如果分配给她的工作，是整天面对程序编码，那她可能永远没有机会去为项目发挥自己最大的作用。

trans.tran_en: someone who writes the words for advertisements
